title: County Health Open Source Project
text:
Welcome to the County Health Open Source Project, a community-driven effort to preserve, update, and extend the County Health Rankings & Roadmaps data after the loss of program funding.
Our mission is to:

title: County Health Open Source Project
text:
Resources

Snapshot App:
Explore county-level health using an interactive interface.
→ https://hannaheow.shinyapps.io/snapshot/
Data Calculations:
Scripts and workflows to compute county-level measures of health.
→ https://github.com/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/county_health_measure_calculations
countyhealthR package:
Seamlessly interact with county-level data in R.
→ LINK TO CRAN ONCE IT’S PUBLISHED
Archived Data:
An archive of 15 years of County Health Rankings & Roadmaps data releases.
→ https://zenodo.org/communities/countyhealthrankingsandroadmaps/records?q=&l=list&p=1&s=10&sort=newest
Archived Documentation:
Historical documentation, methods, and notes.
→ ARCHIVE_OF_ADMIN_SITE_HERE
Check our all of the ways CHR&R data has been used in the past!
Real-time updates of peer-reviewed publications citing CHR&R.
→ A FUN PLAY THING FOR ME :) (in progress)


If you’d like to help, please check out the How to Contribute guide or share ways that you’re using CHR&R data in our Discussion Forum.
Let’s keep this important public data alive together!

title: How to Contribute
text: Thank you for your interest in contributing to the County Health Open Source Project!

title: How to Contribute
text:
Ways to Contribute

Add or update measure calculations

Improve documentation

Report issues or bugs

File an issue in the countyhealthR package
File an issue in the snapshot app


Build educational or visualization tools

Use our historical data archive to advocate for health equity and tell us how you’re using it via the show and tell part of our discussion forum

title: How to Contribute
text:
Getting Started

Fork the GitHub repository

Create a feature branch

Run the calculation scripts locally

Submit a pull request
